title: Lana Del Rey Landing Page
description: A fictitious landing page advertising artist, Lana Del Rey, new album and upcoming tour.
objective: The page is meant to entice users to give their contact information in exchange for early access to purchase concert tickets. The site is completely mobile/tablet responsive and the validation of the content is handle by both the frontend and backend.

title: To Do List
description: A user driven To Do list for writing down everyday tasks and responsibilities
objective: Create an application that allows a user to add tasks to a list and have them saved to a re-writable file. The user will have the ability to mark tasks as completed and delete specific tasks as well. The date of creation to be shown together with each task.

title: Address Book
description: An application that will store contact information.
objective: Develop a small application that will store contact information. Each contact may only one name and  address, but have zero to multiple phone numbers and email addresses. All contacts will be indexed in alphabetical order and searched by the first letter in the first name.

title: Cat Clicker
description: An application that displays a list of cat images and their details.
objective: Create an application displays a list of cat images; each photo should display the cat's name and the number of clicks that cat has received. The number of clicks should be unique to each cat, and should increment when the cat's photo is clicked.

title: RE/MAX Real Estate
description: RE/MAX Real Estate company website redesign.
objective: Translate the design team's re-branding of RE/MAX into a hip interactive website. The site needed to include a personal single page website for each RE/MAX agent, office and team. Once a user has visited any of these single page sites, the user will see the branding of that RE/MAX professional across the site and all lead conversions will go to that professional as well.

title: RE Colorado Real Estate
description: RE Colorado Real Estate company website redesign.
objective: Translate the design team's design of the new RE Colorado website into a Homes.com structured site.

title: PLURvents
description: A website that searches for EDM concerts and festivals with user reviews and posts integration.
objective: Create a website that will aggregate dates and ticket information for all the electronic dance music shows and festivals across the world. The site will give users the freedom to post reviews, experiences and advice about each show. This will create an online opportunity for different users to build a community around a share love of dance music.

title: Century 21 Theme
description: A Century 21 website template theme.
objective: Translate the design team's re-branding of RE Colorado website. The site needed to include a single page website for each real estate agent and office.

title: King Tut Hookah Lounge
description: A website redesign of an Orlando based hookah lounge.
objective: Design and develop a website for an existing company who's current website is in need of a redesign. After being a patron of King Tut's while studying at the university; I decided to use their site for my project. My process included designing a website that had a modern middle eastern vibe while also showcasing King Tut's hookahs, menu options & live performances.

title: Into The AM
description: An EDM merchandise and recording artist company website design
objective: Translate the lead web designer's PSD design into a hand coded HTML & CSS on a Drupal CMS platform.

title: NPSBANK
description: Small business credit card processor website redesign
objective: Create a website that advertised all the products and services of Nationwide Payment Systems, Inc using a pre-structured Wordpress CMS platform.

alttext: United Way HandsOn Suncoast mobile app
title: HandsOn Suncoast
description: Mobile application for a non profit United Way division in Tampa.
objective: Create a mobile application that will alow the HandsOn Suncoast non profit organization to collect donations, notify the community of their involvement and provide a volunteer location map with sign up page.

title: Spazio Italian Restaurant and Wine Lounge
description: Mobile application for an Italian Restaurant.
objective: Create a mobile application that will give Spazio the ability to display their food & drink menu options, send out push notifications, set dinner reservations and provide loyalty reward coupons to their customers.

title: Gold Club Nightclub
description: Mobile application for an adult entertainment venue.
objective: Create a mobile application that will allow Gold Club to send push notifications, provide GPS location directions, customer loyalty rewards program and email mailing list registration.

title: ROC Resto Lounge & Fashion
description: Mobile application for a fashion lounge.
objective: Create a mobile application that will display ROC Resto's food and drink menu, set dinner reservations, send push notifications and connect to their social media accounts.

title: Mac Mania
description: Branding campaign for a Macintosh computers reseller.
objective: Design a logo and branding campaign for a fictitious Macintosh computer reseller.

title: Rock-Abye
description: Branding campaign for baby products.
objective: Design a logo and branding campaign for a fictitious baby products company.

title: Fabulous Occasions
description: Branding campaign for an event planning company.
objective: A branding design for an event planning business in the South Florida area. The branding package consisted of a logo creature, limited color brochure design and stationary.

title: Kaskade CD Cover
description: CD cover design for electronic artist & producer.
objective: Tasked with the challenge of designing a cd cover for my favorite musician, singer or band. I chose to redesign electronic music producer Kaskade's 2008 album Strobelite Seduction.

title: DJ JP T-shirts
description: Texan dj logo and t-shirt designs
objective: Design a logo for DJ JP and his recording studio, B.D. Audio. The logos need to represent the electronic music profession and him as an artist. I also designed and printed two t-shirts designed for women & men.

title: Rock-Abye Baby Products
description: Baby products package design.
objective: Design packaging for a fictitious toiletry company. I created a line of body lotion, bath wash, shampoo/conditioner combo for a babies. Using colorful bottles in fun shapes with hand drawn characters aids in communicating with the target demographic.

title: Redwoods Handcrafted Ale
description: Wheat beer bottle & package design.
objective: Design packaging for a fictitious beverage company. I created Redwoods Brewing Company with their flagship beer, Blood Orange Wheat.
